T02D2387:19b-1: tsitta sya sam pra dh'a ya by'a bashta nam n'a ma /
T02D2387:19b-3: sems la gros 'debs pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2387:20a-2: dpa' bo dpa' mo 'byung po rnams kyis bskor byas pa'i //
T02D2387:20a-3: dpal chen he ru ka yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2387:20a-4: khams gsum sems can rnams kyi sgrib pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2387:20a-5: bdag gzhan rnams kyi don du sems la phan pa'i gros 'debs bya //
T02D2387:20a-6: 'dod pa padma'i chu ltar rig nas sems nyid kyi //
T02D2387:20a-7: bla med lta sgom 'bras bu khyod kyis dran par gyis //
T02D2387:20a-8: de yis dpal ldan zhal mthong gnyis med don rtogs te //
T02D2387:20a-9: de phyir nyams len brtson pas phyag rgya chen po thob pa'i phyir //
T02D2387:20a-10: sna tshogs gzugs sgra sogs la ma chags ma zhen na //
T02D2387:20a-11: 'khor bar mi gnas rgyu med mya ngan 'das pa thob //
T02D2387:20a-12: padma'i bzhin mdzes mngon sum mig gi dbang po dang //
T02D2387:20a-13: sgra brnyan rnams shing sems nyid rmongs 'gyur bas //
T02D2387:20a-14: kye ma zhes sdang phrang dog dug ni ci phyir 'dzin //
T02D2387:20a-15: skra dkar gnyer ma la sogs khyod kyis mthong gyur kyang //
T02D2387:20a-16: yongs su tshol ba'i zhen pas nyes pa skyon gyis bcings //
T02D2387:20a-17: rab 'bring tha ma'i spyod lam 'dod chags zhe sdang gis //
T02D2387:20a-18: mkhas btsun mngon pa'i rgyal 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyam //
T02D2387:20a-19: yi dgas lha min dung 'gro la sogs sdug bsngal mang //
T02D2387:20a-20: de phyir phrag dog spangs lar rang nyid dmigs par gyis //
T02D2387:20a-21: lha dang klu dang mi rnams bde bar grangs mang thob gyur kyang //
T02D2387:20a-22: sems kyi rgyal po 'dod pas mi ngoms ngo mtshar che //
T02D2387:20a-23: gnyen bral sdug bsngal mchi ma rgya mtsho bas kyang
T02D2387:20a-24: lhag / dur khrod gnas kyi keng rus bsags pa
T02D2387:20a-25: ri dang mnyam // 'dod pa'i rma phyung 'khrugs pa'i khrag ni mtsho dang 'dra //
T02D2387:20a-26: kye ma sems kyi rgyal po'i rnal 'byor ci phyir srid mi spong //
T02D2387:20a-27: mi lus 'dod bya khom ldan yang dag thob byas nas //
T02D2387:20a-28: dngos po rnams ni chu bur lta bur brtags byas la //
T02D2387:20a-29: khyod kyis bdag gzhan rnams la ji srid phan par gyis //
T02D2387:20a-30: 'khor pa'i 'dam la bying 'gyur thar ba shin tu dka' //
T02D2387:20a-31: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du 'bod tsha grang sreg cing btsir //
T02D2387:20a-32: sred pas phrag dog yi dgas bkres skom skye 'gyur la //
T02D2387:20a-33: snying rje'i gnas thob dud 'gro phan tshun zhe sdang che //
T02D2387:20a-34: lha yang gnas nas ltung 'gyur mi rnams sdug bsngal mang //
T02D2387:20b-0: @20b de ltar 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal khyod kyis dran khyos la //
T02D2387:20b-1: don dam kun rdzob tha snyad sna tshogs spang bar gyis //
T02D2387:20b-2: longs spyod sprin phung glog ltar rnam par g-yo bar 'gyur //
T02D2387:20b-3: tshe 'di rlung gis bskyod pa'i padma'i chu ltar 'jig
T02D2387:20b-4: / lang tsho rnams ni mi rtag de ltar bltas
T02D2387:20b-5: byas nas // mkhas pa rnams ni myur du nags su 'gro bar gyis //
T02D2387:20b-6: 'khor ba'i 'dod pa'i gnyen bshes chags pas phrag dog skye //
T02D2387:20b-7: mthar yang gshin rje'i gnas 'gro rgyal ba thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2387:20b-8: khyod kyis de ltar shes na thar pa'i lam thob bo //
T02D2387:20b-9: mi lus dam pa yang dang yang du thob pa dka' //
T02D2387:20b-10: dper na rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs rlabs snang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan dang //
T02D2387:20b-11: rmi lam mig 'phrul 'khrul snang sna tshogs sgom byed na //
T02D2387:20b-12: 'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings grol rgyal bya bzhin no //
T02D2387:20b-13: de phyir sems nyid ma chags ma zhe na nyams len gyis //
T02D2387:20b-14: 'khrul zad gang zhig rnal 'byor bde ba thob pa des //
T02D2387:20b-15: sems gsal yal ga brgya yis sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob //
